version_description:
Fixed: Typo on packages screen

Emergencies functionality now available
- When emergency occurs the app will vibrate 3 times and show notification once
Added 747-8F to cargo mode

Separate block time and flight time in reports (applies to new flights only)

Inside Notifications/Approvals screen you must now approve/reject flights for your airline by other pilots, before they affect your stats. Flights saved by yourself will automatically be approved.

Switched to subscription based model
- This will also fix the issues some users are having when downloading sound packs as all sound packs will be included as part of the subscription. No more paying for individual packs or features. - Cargo mode will be included in this.

Added callouts option (Aircraft specific sounds - Airbus & Boeing for now):
- Descent rate
- Low gear
- Low flaps
- Bank angle (Not available for Airbus)
- Positive rateâ€¦Gear up
- 80kts call out and updated V1, VR

Added additional sound packs:
- Mexicana
- Adria
- HOP!
- Nordica
- Middle Eastern Airlines (MEA)
- Lion Air
- Copa
- TAAG
- Thomas Cook

- Add Mayday and Pan Pan sounds when in Emergency mode
- Fixed: Crash in cargo mode
- Fixed: The messages/approvals count number on the message icon
- Fixed: Post landing announcements would not play if boarding music had not been selected
- Limited the flight approvals to last 30 days
Squished some bugs

Fixed issue where turning boarding music all the way down still had sound
Improved loading of sound packs list
Fixed bug from previous update where sound packs were not selectable even with subscription
Squished some bugs

Switched to mixture of MSL/AGL for violation checking depending on the altitude of the location.

Added 757 to cargo mode.

Strobe lights were used to stop audio and start flight. This was causing issue when using strobe to cross runway as it would stop the safety briefing. This has been changed to landing lights now.

When ending flight you only had to switch off one engine, now you have to switch them all off. As some aircraft are designed to taxi with just one engine. This was ending the flight too early.

Added sounds: El Al, Gulf Air, Oman Air and Fiji Airways

- Ability to set airline logo and pilot profile picture
- Added ability to delete own airline
- Added help guides/walkthroughs into the app
- Fixed issue where unapproved flights would still affect the airlines income
- Merged notifications and approvals into new Alerts screen. A single place for all requests, notifications and approvals.
- Improved UI of planes selection screen on tablet devices
- Added 'Follow' screen where you can follow others or see your Followers list
- Updated live map to show pilots and airlines you're following in red
- Fixed bug where Dash 8 was not recognized

Safety audio will now only stop when both landing lights and strobe lights have been turned on
Added switch to allow you to decide between using MSL or AGL altitude for violations - AGL should only be used if flying in high elevation areas
- Bug fix on live flights map screen
Fixed crash on Thai language devices
Fixed bug with certain aircraft not being detected properly.
Reduced background audio level

- Fixed bug where music would play after landing even if not enabled
- Other bug fixes

Fresh new design and logo
Added pilot income
Hotfix: Some sound packs were missing in new design version. This has been fixed now.
Fixed planes screen list issue
Fixed plane selection
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Added A350
Bug fix on flight saving
Bug fix on flight tracking

Fixed aircraft position on map
Fixed sound pack images not appearing
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes
